word: Thither the faith of Christ's disciples followed him as he ascended from their sight. Here their hopes centered, \93which hope we have,\94 said Paul, \93as an anchor of the soul, both sure and steadfast, and which entereth into that within the veil; whither the forerunner is for us entered, even Jesus, made an high priest forever.\94 \93Neither by the blood of goats and calves, but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place, having obtained eternal redemption for us.\94 [Hebrews 6:19, 20; 9:12.]
